description: A collection of "really rare" timepieces is put on display on the Isle of Manx of the first time.
title: Historic clocks displayed on Isle of Man for first time
title_page: Historic clocks displayed on Isle of Man for first time - BBC News
maintext: Dr Taylor, whose interest in horology stems from childhood memories of watching his father repair grandfather clocks, said he hoped displaying the objects would help to show "young people in particular" the "magic" of the craftsmanship of clockmakers.
